original: ma h'a s'a ha sra pra marda ni s'a dha nam /
analyzed: ma h'a s'a ha sra pra marda ni s'a dha nam /

original: bod skad du /🔽stong chen mor rab tu 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: bod skad du / stong chen mor rab tu 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
translated: In Tibetan:🔽stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs

original: 'phags ma stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: sngon bzhin kho nar thams cad byas la /
analyzed: sngon bzhin kho nar thams cad byas la /

original: stong pa nyid kyi rjes su stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma dkar mo zhal gcig ma /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rjes su stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma dkar mo zhal gcig ma /
translated: After emptiness, [one should appear as] white Mahāsāhasrapramardinī with one face,

original: g-yas pa'i phyag gsum rnams su go rims ji lta bar ral gri dang / mda' dang mchog sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i phyag gsum rnams su go rims ji lta bar ral gri dang / mda' dang mchog sbyin pa'o //
translated: and three right hands holding a sword, arrow, and boon-granting mudrā,

original: g-yon pa'i phyag gsum rnams su gzhu dang / zhags pa dang dgra sta'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i phyag gsum rnams su gzhu dang / zhags pa dang dgra sta'o //
translated: and three left hands holding a bow, lasso, and tarjanī mudrā.

original: sna tshogs pa'i cha lugs kyi na bza' dang / rgyan dang / dbu rgyan dang / lang tshol babs pa'i gzugs sgeg pa la sogs pa'i yon tan can rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i cha lugs kyi na bza' dang / rgyan dang / dbu rgyan dang / lang tshol babs pa'i gzugs sgeg pa la sogs pa'i yon tan can rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can /
translated: She wears a variety of garments, ornaments, crown, and is youthful and attractive with the qualities of beauty and so forth, and has a crown of Vairocana.

original: brum gyi sa bon las byung ba'i zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i rgyab rten can no //
analyzed: brum gyi sa bon las byung ba'i zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i rgyab rten can no //
translated: It arises from the seed syllable bhrūṃ, and it has a moon seat and a moon back-rest.

original: aom brum zhes pa'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: aom brum zhes pa'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should recite the mantra oṃ bhrūṃ.

original: @53b 'phags ma stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
analyzed: @53b 'phags ma stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
translated: The sādhana of Noble Mahāyānī Prajñāpāramitā is complete.

original: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus so//
analyzed: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus so//
translated: It was translated, corrected, and finalized by the paṇḍita Amoghavajra and the translator-monk Chag Drakpa Jangchup.
